clinical_history: Urinary difficulty and suspected prostate enlargement.
findings: Urinary bladder is well-defined, no intraluminal lesions.
Left kidney shows ill-defined, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Common bile duct measures 36.88 mm, within normal limits.
Soft tissue region demonstrates unremarkable without fluid collection.
Testes are well-defined with normal vascularity.
